data.title: je tu il-là elles (2017) in collaboration with Ensemble Adapter, premiere December 14th, 2017, Berlin
data.meta_description: In collaboration with Ensemble Adapter, my new composition for flute, clarinet, harp, percussion, and electronics je tu il-là elles (2017) is to be premiered by the ensemble tomorrow, December 14th 20h30, at the ExRotaprint in Wedding, Berlin. A winner of the Adoptions 2017 call-for-proposal, the project of je tu il-là elles will be performed alongside…
data.meta_site_name: Mu-Xuan Lin, composer   林慕萱 作曲
data.text:
In collaboration with Ensemble Adapter, my new composition for flute, clarinet, harp, percussion, and electronics je tu il-là elles (2017) is to be premiered by the ensemble tomorrow, December 14th 20h30, at the ExRotaprint in Wedding, Berlin.

A winner of the Adoptions 2017 call-for-proposal, the project of je tu il-là elles will be performed alongside four other projects by Mathieu Corajod (CH), Piotr Peszat (PL), Heather Frasch (USA), and Jacek Sotomski (PL) respectively. The Icelandic-German Ensemble Adapter consists of Gunnhildur Einarsdóttir (harp), Kristjana Helgadóttir (flute), Matthias Engler (percussion), and Ingólfur Vilhjálmsson (clarinet).

If you enjoy what you hear or read on this website and would like to further support composer Mu-Xuan Lin, please consider making a small donation to enable her to continue writing music, attend performances of her works, and travel to present her music world-wide.
